title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
EB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server should return an HTTP error 404 instead of HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
SR: The server should return an HTTP error 404 when a URL is accessed on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
